aka: The Carriage Running into the Winter
trans_title: The Carriage Running into the Winter
introduction: SYNOPSISAfter a failed first marriage, Yun-hi is about to remarry but at her wedding , the new husband CEO Pak of pharmaceutical company, collapses due to high blood pressure and becomes a vegetable. Without a marriage license, Yun-hi suffers from solitude due to a strict family tradition. Her mother-in-law and sister-in-law blame Yun-hi for CEO Pak's condition. They strain her to the point that Yun-hi feels suffocated. CEO Pak's son, Wu-seob returns from his studies in America. Wu-seob tries to rescue Yun-hi by offering her his compassion but Yun-hi feels morally conflicted so she runs away. Wu-seob goes looking for her and confesses his love for her when he finds her. Feeling that he could be hurt because of her, Yun-hi attempts suicide in the guise of an accident.故事云辉失败的第一次婚姻庆祝的夜晚总统婚礼悲惨的一章嫁给制药公司高管的营养高血压。甚至在一个艰难的婚姻gapung sidalrideon云辉孤独正在转动的大理石和妹妹在法律的发病baksajang把没有意义的克制，以云辉一口气在那里可以放松回到wooseop的儿子baksajang美国一项研究。让异性wooseop访问云辉逃脱云辉云辉是远离家乡的感觉的道德冲突。让wooseop找到云辉从家里坦白自己的爱情尼亚·普雷最好的自杀想法，可能是不高兴，因为他本人。
